data.title: C5 electric car: failure of a marketing strategy
data.meta_description: Click to launch & play an online audio visual presentation by Mr. PR Smith on C5 electric car: failure of a marketing strategy, part of a collection of multimedia lectures.
data.text:
How Cookies Are Used

Cookies are of the following types:

Essential to make the site function.

Used to analyse and improve visitor experience.

For more information see our Cookie Policy.

Some types of cookies can be disabled by you but doing so may adversely affect functionality. Please see below:

If you block these cookies or set alerts in your browser parts of the website will not work.

Cookies that provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. If not allowed functionality may be impaired.

Cookies that count and track visits and on website activity enabling us to organise the website to optimise the experience of users. They may be blocked without immediate adverse effect.
